letters.description: Identify current behavioral triggers and emotional flashbacks rooted in childhood wounding.
Map the developmental core wounds and specific unmet needs from the client's formative years.
Establish a safe, somatic dialogue with the younger self through guided visualization.
Attune to the inner child's silenced voice and hidden emotional requirements without judgment.
Validate the child's historical pain to dissolve inherited shame and emotional blockages.
Bridge the inner child and adult self through consistent reparenting and nervous system regulation.
Embody an authentic, whole identity characterized by healthy boundaries, playfulness, and emotional freedom.
